doc:
Donald Crisp https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Donald_Crisp 0 Donald Crisp (born George William Crisp, 27 July 1882 – 25 May 1974) was an English film actor. He was an early producer, director and screenwriter. His career lasted from the early silent film era into the 1960s. He won an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor in 1942 for his performance in How Green Was My Valley. Donald_Crisp ( born George_William_Crisp , 27_July_1882 – 25_May_1974 ) was an_English_film_actor . He was an_early_producer_,_director_and_screenwriter . His_career lasted from the_early_silent_film_era into the_1960s . He won an_Academy_Award for Best_Supporting_Actor in 1942 for his_performance in How Green Was My_Valley .
